name: GLKViewController
desc: A view controller that manages an OpenGL ES rendering loop.

items.name: var preferredFramesPerSecond: Int
items.desc: The rate you want the view controller to call the view to update the contents of the view.

items.name: var framesPerSecond: Int
items.desc: The actual rate that the view controller attempts to call the view to update its contents.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the rendering loop is paused.

items.name: var pauseOnWillResignActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view controller automatically pauses the rendering loop when the application resigns the active state.

items.name: var resumeOnDidBecomeActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view controller automatically resumes the rendering loop when the application becomes active.

items.name: var framesDisplayed: Int
items.desc: The number of frame updates that have been sent by the view controller since it was created.

items.name: var timeSinceFirstResume: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time that has passed since first time the view controller resumed sending update events.

items.name: var timeSinceLastResume: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time that has passed since the last time the view controller resumed sending update events.

items.name: var timeSinceLastUpdate: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time that has passed since the last time the view controller called the delegate’s glkViewControllerUpdate(_:) method.

items.name: var timeSinceLastDraw: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time that has passed since the last time the view controller called the view’s display() method.
